description:
Topher (short for Christopher) is a very outgoing 21-year-old.
He categorizes himself as straight. He told me that he likes to nail girls with his buddies, but was quick to point out that there is no touching between the guys (well, except for maybe one time).
He's big into Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, which he he says is all about the "take down."
"It's the submission," he said. "Totally."
He had a very interesting sunburn line across his butt. It was like he had been wearing a speedo that couldn't contain his (very nice) ass.
When I asked him about it he replied: "I wanted to get tan for this shoot, but I over did it."
title: Topher
